job_tasks.phrase: Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the creation and enhancement of software applications, a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
job_tasks.justification: This involves applying technical knowledge to implement new solutions and adhere to established standards, which falls under software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring resiliency and availability of products is a key aspect of operations and maintaining systems in production.

soft_skills.phrase: Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
Be a productive member of the team.

classification.rationale: The job description lacks specific technical details related to AI or Generative AI, focusing more on general software development and operational responsibilities. There's no mention of LLMs, prompt engineering, RAG, or specific AI modeling tasks, making it impossible to classify as a GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer.
